title: OQ Technology’s “wake-up” patent draws yawn from IoT smallsat rival
summary: Luxembourg startup OQ Technology said Feb. 16 it has secured its first patent for a planned satellite constellation to connect internet of things (IoT) devices.

title: Russian ASAT debris creating “squalls” of close approaches with satellites
summary: Debris from a Russian antisatellite weapon demonstration in November are creating surges of close approaches, in some cases tens of thousands in a week, with active satellites in low Earth orbit.

title: New research directly observes atmospheric loss on mini-Neptune exoplanets, provides insight into exoplanet evolution
summary: In two studies recently released by a group of astronomers researching exoplanets, the first direct observations of atmospheric loss on mini-Neptune exoplanets were confirmed. What’s more, the data from the studies points to the atmospheric loss potentially causing the mini-Neptunes to transform into super-Earth exoplanets — a stunning discovery in exoplanet research.

title: NASA's Perseverance Celebrates First Year on Mars by Learning to Run
summary: The rover has racked up a series of accomplishments, including new distance records, as it reaches the end of the first of several planned science campaigns on the Red Planet.

title: State Fight: Space sector is humming in Huntsville, Alabama
summary: Rocket city doesn’t intend to give up its title.

title: State Fight: Colorado wages international campaign in space sector
summary: Competition to attract space companies is going global, and Colorado is waging an international campaign.

title: NASA TV to Air NOAA’s GOES-T Launch, Prelaunch Activities
summary: NASA will provide coverage of the prelaunch and launch activities of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration’s (NOAA) next weather observing and environmental monitoring system satellite.

title: Blue Origin to increase New Shepard launches in 2022
summary: Blue Origin expects to more than double the number of people it flies on its New Shepard suborbital system this year while adding another vehicle to its fleet.

title: SpaceX’s South Texas Starship factory has a new tallest building
summary: Less than four months after construction began, the newest addition to SpaceX’s South Texas Starship factory is now the facility’s tallest building....

title: Florida’s Space Coast is busier than ever, but there’s room for more
summary: Long the busiest space launch complex in the United States, Cape Canaveral and Kennedy extended their combined five-year streak as the busiest commercial, civil and military launch range in the world.
